programme.title: Sweet 16
programme.desc: Melissa tries to make friends in her new town, but each of the boys she spends time with is found murdered.

programme.title: Sorority House Massacre
programme.desc: College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: After a prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Doomsday Machine
programme.desc: When a Chinese plot to destroy the Earth is uncovered, the U.S. teams up with the Soviet Union to replace members of its all-male crew with women.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Frankenstein's Castle of Freaks
programme.desc: The count recruits a dwarf and others to help him put a brain in the body of a brute.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Gamera, Super Monster
programme.desc: With the intention of conquering Earth, the evil alien Zanon unleashes the biggest threat Gamera's ever faced!

programme.title: Road Games
programme.desc: An American truck driver starts to suspect a man driving a green van of killing young women along his route.

programme.title: Summer of 84
programme.desc: Teenager Davey Armstrong is a conspiracy theorist who begins to suspect that a neighbouring police officer is a serial killer.

programme.title: Deadcon
programme.desc: A group of influencers must unravel the mystery behind a vengeful spirit at the biggest digital event of the year.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama, the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Phantasm: Remastered
programme.desc: The residents of a small town have begun dying under strange circumstances, leading young Mike to investigate.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: A cat injected with a genetically-engineered virus escapes a laboratory and stows away on a criminal's yacht.

programme.title: Alligator
programme.desc: A flushed baby alligator survives on hormone-filled lab rats, grows giant, and unleashes chaos in Chicago.
